attributes.action: Immediately increase spending on the NHS by £350million a week as promised.
attributes.additional_details:
report showing that £350 mill figure is a lie- http://www.theguardian.com/politics/reality-check/2016/may/23/does-the-eu-really-cost-the-uk-350m-a-week 
Nigel farage saying nhs wont get extra £350mil - http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/nigel-farage-admits-wont-extra-8271594 
misteral code 1.2c stating mps who mislead public must offer resignation https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/468255/Final_draft_ministerial_code_No_AMENDS_14_Oct.pdf
attributes.background: The leave campaign stated the above, and we should hold them to it. If they are not able to do this for any reason, then they must admit the leave campaign was a lie, and a second referendum must be held. Further, any and all MP's and ministers in the campaign must resign for misleading the public.
